Author: Veter2000
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: I still have not received tokens for the second part of the bounty. In the official group of telegrams admin can not give a clear answer. Nobody replied to the letter of Peunio's technical support. Just a monstrous lack of feedback and unworthy of a large company ignoring questions.  trade.io to Delist PCO From Exchange  As part of our promise and responsibility to protect our users, we have decided to delist Pecunio‚Äôs utility token, PCO, from the trade.io Exchange. The team carries out regular reviews on all digitals assets listed on our platform in order to ensure a high standard of quality.  In the event a coin or token falls below trade.io's high-quality standard, it will be subject to further review and potentially delisted. For public transparency, the decision to delist PCO was made due to inactivity and lack of responsiveness from their team. After numerous attempts to get in touch, we notified Pecunio that their coin would be delisted should they not respond.  Based on these reasons, we have decided to delist PCO and cease trading on 21st of January.  Withdrawals of PCO from our exchange will continue to be supported until it is delisted.  We have also requested that our board member, Jim Preissler, be removed from their website, as he is no longer an advisor to them.  Going forward, we remain committed to protecting our users and ensure to keep you updated on whenever we take the decision to delist coins and tokens.

Author: vladdani
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: For the newcomers to the cryptomarket it might be quite difficult to get through all these crypto exchanges, transaction costs, deposit and withdrawal rules as well as to built own portfolio of cryptos and even design an investment strategy in this unregulated Crypto Wild West. I found one of the easiest ways to tap the crypto market - to invest in the crypto strategies on the Blackmoon Platform. They offer 3 different types of strategies: 1) BMxT20 focuses on the cryptocurrencies with the largest market cap, so its portfolio constantly consists of the largest cryptos on the market. 2) BMx1DV follows the cryptos with the largest volatility meaning you track the coins with the largest price fluctuations; 3) BMxDDR invests in 6 coins with the largest capitalisation and has a kind of downside risk protection by dynamically allocating portfolio between crypto and cash. These strategies are daily rebalanced (except for BMxT20) and executed 24/7. As for me it‚Äôs quite exciting to wake up in the morning and first of all look at my profile at Blackmoon to see the latest price!

Author: Crypto4K
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: Here is the official email that went out to all members of our platform:   Dear PECUNIO member,  I have great news for you today. As promised we have finalized all KYC verifications for bounty and airdrop participants. The PCO tokens for your individual case have been put into your PECUNIO account.  You can simply check your current balance by logging into your account.  Furthermore as you have noticed the development of our PECUNIO Venture Capital Fund is proceeding at full speed. Each week we do have multiple deals to close and our deal pipeline is growing every day.  Top blockchain projects are queuing up to work and grow together with PECUNIO!   For example our latest deal closed today:  Fan360  is a sports social media platform who rewards fans for liking and engaging with sports content. Fan360 is supported by world class athletes like Gianluigi Buffon or √Ångel Di Maria or ‚ÄúShark Tank‚Äù participant Kevin Harrington.  Youtube Video: https://www.youtube.com/embed/6dImGEMiQJ0        PECUNIO Crypto Currency Exchange  Since our fund development is running that well and our valued airdrop and bounty participants are looking for a way to trade PCO tokens. We have decided to add our highly anticipated PECUNIO Crypto Currency Exchange into the product development queue and speeding up it‚Äôs creation process.  So you can directly buy and sell your PCO tokens on the PECUNIO platform without having to inconveniently spend additional time transferring to external exchanges. PECUNIO will position itself as the leading Crypto Currency Exchange in the U.A.E and we are planing to take a huge share of this still very young market. By doing so we are adding more value to the PECUNIO brand and company. Gaining more volume and liquidity to your PCO tokens hence making it easier for you to buy or sell PCO.    I will keep you posted about the recent developments of our fund and our exchange.  Filled with great honour I thank all investors, advisors and participants who are supporting PECUNIO on it‚Äôs way to form the financial market of the future.  Yours, Reinhard Berger (CEO PECUNIO)

Author: Crypto4K
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: As you might have noticed, things changed a lot in the last few months. Just a year ago there were probably just a 1/10 the amount of ICOs around. Suddenly the SEC and other financial authorities take a look at things and issue out laws.  Nobody was trapped. If someone doesn't like the idea of KYC, they can have their money back. We have successfully refunded the few members that were not allowed to hold tokens. All we did was to adapt to the market situation, in order not to lose our safely build brand and company. Please understand that this is worth more, than sending you the token, making you happy and getting the company closed for that.  I hope you can understand! It's all about sharing and maintaining the value we created. Maybe you want to make a youtube video on KYC, explaining what this means and which countries are the best and the worst concerning that?   We will role out soon, in the mean time let us build this company please!

Author: morantis
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: Root Blockchain for Pecunio‚Äôs business partners    Dubai, 4th June, 2018‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäRoot Blockchain, a start-up that hides blockchain complexity from business and provides a ‚Äúplug and play‚Äù solution for blockchain interaction, recently signed a deal with Pecunio.  Pecunio, the asset platform for safe and easy blockchain investments from Dubai, U.A.E., aims at processing safe B2B transcations with a fully asset-backed gold token. At the moment it is difficult for many businesses to adopt blockchain technology due to its complexity and volatility. Root Blockchains fusion into the existing IT infrastructure is done via a simple API to interact with blockchain easier. The combination of both businesses‚Äô technologies could be tremendous.  Besides high-end institutional cryptocurrency funds, products and services will allow easy trades between business partners all over the globe via a simple to use interface and a ‚Äústable coin‚Äù gold token ensuring price stability for large volume transactions.  Root Blockchain also employs a unique mechanism for increasing the speed of confirmations transactions on the blockchain, while at the same time keeping the costs low. Only digital fingerprints of the actual transaction data are stored in the blockchain. Storage of the actual data itself is optional. If data storage is opted for, Root Blockchain provides a separate secure digital vault for encrypted data storage.  https://medium.com/pecunio/root-blockchain-for-pecunios-business-partners-f7f8fd83202

Author: Crypto4K
Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: There are three main products for now.  1) PCO, Pecunio company tokens (access to the platforms goods and services)  2) Goldtoken PGX (asset-backed gold tokens, sold out, live on the blockchain)  3) PCC, Pecunio Cryptocurrency Fund (our first fund product, managed by the ICONOMI platform)     KYC is important for the continuation of the platform. We don't intend on violating any countries law and we need to apply to current industry standards. So it may take long, but it is definitely the safest way to a successful future! Thank you for your patience!   Right now we are working on tightening ties in the industry, with various interesting partnerships evolving and great support from different institutions!  Announcements will be made, we are working on our exchange listings recently.    Please check out our TWITTER for the latest ANNOUNCEMENTS!!!

The exact address can be found in the imprint section on the homepage!  https://pecun.io/en/imprint   Quote from: GoBelle on March 29, 2018, 06:00:01 PM Do you think your gold backed token would be outperforming the current market if it had launched last year? I was under the impression that they come from a more traditional financial background.  Reinhard Berger the CEO was pretty much fed up with the way traditional finance works. He had managed investment funds in size of $250 million+ and worked for the banking sector before. Find the bio in the whitepaper. His enthusiasm was nothing but a logical reaction after understanding the implications all over different industries. Also CCO, Oama Richson occupied himself with cryptocurrencies pretty early and out of natural interest in hope for change of a non-functional and nontransparent financial system. Both teamed up with the dream of getting crypto to the masses. The rest of the team could well identify with the ideas and motives and joined into a crypto alliance called Pecunio! Body: Mr. Nunn has a great network of crypto enthusiasts supporting and following him and not only that, also his contacts to the industry are not to be disregarded. A brief history of his progression:  Phillip Nunn founded The Blackmore Group in 2013. Today it‚Äôs grown into a business with substantial assets under management and a suite of investment products across multiple classes for individuals and institutions in the UK and overseas.  With more than 15 years‚Äô experience in financial services, Phillip specialises in wealth management, angel investment, commercial property investment and financial technology. He founded The Blackmore Group on the core belief of giving clients real and tangible alternatives to poor investment performance and providing ‚Äúfuture proof‚Äù investment strategies.  Phillip has become a well-known, online influencer in the blockchain and crypto space and has travelled the world evangelising and talking on these subjects. Phillip has sat on the advisory boards of many ICO's over the past 12 months and has helped structure and fund some of the biggest companies of the future. Along with his business Wealth Chain, Phillip will be launching his own crypto fund that looks to invest in ICO's along with existing blockchain technology companies.   Hope this answers questions!

Title: [ANN] ‚ö°Ô∏è PECUNIO - blockchain investments safe and easy ‚ö°Ô∏è
Body: Dear friends, followers and members please note:  This is to inform our investors and well-wishers that we are channeling all our resources in getting our gold backed token (the "Pecunio Gold Coin", PGC) market ready, due to massive interest by institutional partners.  This is the reason behind our decision to postpone our ICO for a couple of weeks as we believe that the PGC, our newest and best asset, will revolutionize the financial markets. The current market environment provides perfect conditions for growth.  We want to be ready with the gold token concept and design before the ICO, so that our ICO investors can fully benefit from this exciting new asset backed token.  The new timeline for our ICO proves our renewed continuing commitment towards creating a truly valuable and fully accessible platform for crypto investments.    New dates of our ICO are as follows:  19th of March - 19th of April 2018.

TWITTER | FACEBOOK | TELEGRAM | STEEMIT  Pecunio, a new decentralized investment platform, simplifies blockchain investments and solves the problem of crypto spending. What‚Äôs revolutionary about the platform is, that it allows both saving and spending of crypto assets in a fund universe that is safe, affordable and easy to use.   WHITEPAPER  Together with our investors we want to change the new financial market. By providing easy and secure access for everyone, by providing professionally managed investment funds with low draw-down rates, by making crypto-currencies spendable via a debit-card, and last but not least by establishing the most secure and stable crypto-currency of the world: our gold-backed token.
